main.title: Helping people in organizations do their job faster

item.title: Artificial Intelligence infused Service Operations
item.description: ELLI-AI is Europe’s most lean and cost-effective Virtual Enterprise Assistant which is acting like an Executive Assistant for each employee.

spend.title: We spend roughly 30% of our job time to :
spend.description: on requests for things preventing us from getting our job done, ELLI-AI can help reduce this significantly.

system.title: Is augmenting staff & overlaying existing systems
description: ELLI-AI can augment staff by communicating with users via natural dialog like human interactions.
ELLI-AI overlays existing business systems and processes via intelligent process automation.

infrastructure.title: How does ELLI-AI fit in your organization infrastructure?

testimonials.title: Testimonials
items: "Elli is a symbol of digital transformation. It pushes companies into the future." Iulian Iuga, CEO
"Conversational AI-first will supersede cloud-first, mobile-first as the most important, high-level imperative throughout 2027. It will be a new IT paradigm, more than a trend." Gartner
"Elli is the go-to preferred agent when I need something in my company. If it cannot help me on the spot, it will guide me to a solution as soon as possible." Nicholas Guy, Software Developer

subscribe.title: STAY FRIENDS WITH ELLI-AI!
description: Join our friend e-mail list for the latest news, product updates, events, and more only related to ELLI-AI.

You can change your mind at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in the footer of any e-mail you receive from us, or by contacting us at info@elli-ai.com. We will treat your information with respect. By entering your e-mail address and clicking below, you agree that we may process your information in accordance with these terms.
